title: Baby born with three legs and two penises will live normal life after surgery
text:
The baby boy is believed to have started life as a twin (Picture: Moscow Health Department / east2west news)

Doctors saved a baby boy born with three legs, two penises and no anus after his mum refused to have an abortion.

An emergency operation was carried out in Russia after the baby, who is believed to have been a twin, didn’t fully develop in his mother’s womb.

The additional leg was spotted when the unidentified woman, who lives in a provincial Russian region, went in for a routine scan.

She told them she didn’t want an abortion and went on to deliver the newborn in a natural birth in July 2018.

The baby underwent an urgent operation after the birth when he couldn’t defecate.

One month later, his middle leg – which was located between the two other legs – was removed at Holy Vladimir Children’s Hospital in Moscow by one of Russia’s top paediatric surgeons Professor Yury Sokolov, 55, accompanied by Dr Evgenia Kartseva.

The baby just before surgery at one month old (Picture: Moscow Health Department / east2west news)

The little boy is now 14 months old and walking (Picture: Moscow Health Department / east2west news)

In February this year, urologists removed the child’s additional genitals and second set of urinary organs.

The baby then had surgery to shape the anus in the correct location.

A medical source said: ‘Most likely, at the beginning these were twins. The middle leg had two heels.

‘These had to be two boys, but (in the womb) it turned into just one baby.’

The boy is now 14 months old and walking around.

A computer tomography image of the baby boy with three legs (Picture: Moscow Health Department / east2west news)

He needs one more operation in three months time to allow for the normal use of the anus, say medics.

However, he can otherwise look forward to a ‘normal life’.

A Moscow health department source said: ‘The boy is 14 months old now.

‘He is walking and looking around at the world.

‘He is curious.’

description: Doctors at Holy Vladimir Children's Hospital saved a baby born with three legs, two penises and no anus after his mum refused an abortion.
